required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Characteristics of Pulmonary Vascular Changes in Patients With Kidney Transplantation
clinical_study.official_title: Characteristics of Pulmonary Vascular Changes in Patients With Kidney Transplantation

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study is to investigate pulmonary hemodynamics at rest and during exercise in patients before and after kidney transplantation.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in the systolic pulmonary arterial pressure/cardiac output (SPAP/CO) slope
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 1 year after kidney transplantation
primary_outcome.description: Change in the systolic pulmonary arterial pressure/cardiac output (SPAP/CO) slope (calculated as the difference of maximal and resting SPAP divided by the difference of maximal and resting CO) before versus one year after kidney transplantation assessed by exercise echocardiography

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in systolic pulmonary arterial pressure at rest before versus one year after kidney transplantation assessed by (exercise) echocardiography
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 1 year after kidney transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in systolic pulmonary arterial pressure at 25 Watts before versus one year after kidney transplantation assessed by (exercise) echocardiography
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 1 year after kidney transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in mean pulmonary arterial pressure at rest before versus one year after kidney transplantation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 1 year after kidney transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in mean pulmonary arterial pressure during exercise before versus one year after kidney transplantation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 1 year after kidney transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in pulmonary vascular resistance at rest before versus one year after kidney transplantation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 1 year after kidney transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in pulmonary vascular resistance during exercise before versus one year after kidney transplantation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 1 year after kidney transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in pulmonary arterial wedge pressure at rest before versus one year after kidney transplantation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 1 year after kidney transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in pulmonary arterial wedge pressure during exercise before versus one year after kidney transplantation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 1 year after kidney transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in cardiac output at rest before versus one year after kidney transplantation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 1 year after kidney transplantation

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in cardiac output during exercise before versus one year after kidney transplantation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and 1 year after kidney transplantation

arm_group.description: Patients listed for first kidney transplantation

intervention.description: All patients will undergo exercise echocardiography during a symptom-limited cardiopulmonary exercise test.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age: ≥ 18 years
- patients listed for first kidney transplantation at the Clinical Division of Nephrology
Exclusion Criteria:
- Age < 18 years
- combined organ transplantations (heart-kidney, pancreas-kidney etc.)
- patients with prior kidney transplantation
- high calcium score on cardiac-CT (> 160 Agatston Score)

overall_official.affiliation: Medical University of Graz, Department of Internal Medicine, Division of Pulmonology

facility.name: Medical University of Graz, Department of Internal Medicine, Division of Pulmonology
